thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Why Emerging Markets Are Hanging on the Fate of Silicon Valley

author: Mike Bird
title: Why Emerging Markets Are Hanging on the Fate of Silicon Valley
text:
Technology shares now dominate emerging markets like commodities once did, leaving those indexes even more exposed than U.S. benchmarks to selloffs in the sector.
But some analysts ask whether indiscriminate selling is punishing Asian technology companies for what are mainly U.S. problems.
The recent tech selloff has knocked 6.3% off the MSCI...
